section.p: A questionnaire is a written or electronic survey instrument comprised of a series of questions, designed to measure a specific item or set of items. Questionnaire data may include, but are not limited to subject reported outcomes and validated or non-validated questionnaires. The QS domain is not intended for use in submitting a set of questions grouped on the CRF for convenience of data capture.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the questionnaire finding. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: QSTESTCD, QSTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
Used to capture the evaluation interval associated with the questionnaire finding. E.g., "Have you experienced any episodes in the last two years?" [SDTM: QSEVLINT]

SHALL contain [1..2] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the questionnaire finding. [SDTM: QSSEQ, QSSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value
The response to the questionnaire item indicated by the code value. A result or finding in standard format should be recorded as a base value - either code or physical quantity. A modified reported term is included as a translation. [SDTM: QSORRES, QSORRESU, QSSTRESC, QSSTRESN, QSSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Allows capture of a group identifier for the response to the question.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the question is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] questionnaireCategory with data type questionnaire Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the question is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] questionnaireSubCategory with data type questionnaire Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not the specified questionnaire response was elicited. [SDTM: QSSTAT]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the question.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether or not a result is considered a baseline value for the study.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Baseline Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether or not a data value has derived frrom the results of other tests or inquiries.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived Data Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.60)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Orients the timing of the question and response with respect to a study defined timepoint.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.74)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to capture information, most particularly the timing, regarding the collection of data for an event. This is relevant especially in cases where the timing and duration of an event are distinct from that of data collection.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.59)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain [1..2] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the questionnaire finding. [SDTM: QSSEQ, QSSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the questionnaire finding. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: QSTESTCD, QSTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not the specified questionnaire response was elicited. [SDTM: QSSTAT]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
Used to capture the evaluation interval associated with the questionnaire finding. E.g., "Have you experienced any episodes in the last two years?" [SDTM: QSEVLINT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value
The response to the questionnaire item indicated by the code value. A result or finding in standard format should be recorded as a base value - either code or physical quantity. A modified reported term is included as a translation. [SDTM: QSORRES, QSORRESU, QSSTRESC, QSSTRESN, QSSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the response to the question.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the question is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] questionnaireCategory with data type questionnaire Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the question is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] questionnaireSubCategory with data type questionnaire Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the question.

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Baseline Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Used to indicate whether or not a result is considered a baseline value for the study.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived Data Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.60)
Used to indicate whether or not a data value has derived frrom the results of other tests or inquiries.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.74)
Orients the timing of the question and response with respect to a study defined timepoint.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.59)
Used to capture information, most particularly the timing, regarding the collection of data for an event. This is relevant especially in cases where the timing and duration of an event are distinct from that of data collection.
